languages.text: "Судя по тому, как бегают глазки у того серфа в дальних рядах — да, заглотил сучий потрох наживку, как миленький. Скоро все начнется". {n}Старушка улыбается самой благостной из возможных улыбок.{/n}

"Judging by the way that serf in the back row keeps glancing around, our Nemesite has swallowed the bait just like the void rat he is. The porridge will hit the fan any moment now." {n}A most benign smile crosses her face.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Судя по тому, как бегают глазки у того серфа в дальних рядах — да, заглотил сучий потрох наживку, как миленький. Скоро все начнется". {n}Старушка улыбается самой благостной из возможных улыбок.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Judging by the way that serf in the back row keeps shifting his eyes, the son of a bitch swallowed the bait like a void rat the he is. The porridge will hit the fan any moment now." {n}Belinda is beaming with the gentlest of smiles.{/n}

"Judging by the way that serf in the back row keeps shifting his eyes, the son of a bitch swallowed the bait like a void rat the he is. The porridge will hit the fan any moment now." {n}Belinda is beaming with the gentlest of smiles.{/n}

"Judging by the way that serf in the back row keeps glancing around, the son of a bitch has swallowed the bait just like the void rat he is. The porridge will hit the fan any moment now." {n}A most benign smile crosses Belinda's face.{/n}

"Judging by the way that serf in the back row keeps glancing around, the son of a bitch has swallowed the bait just like the void rat he is. The porridge will hit the fan any moment now." {n}A most benign smile crosses Belinda's face.{/n}

"Judging by the way that serf in the back row keeps glancing around, our Nemesite has swallowed the bait just like the void rat he is. The porridge will hit the fan any moment now." {n}A most benign smile crosses her face.{/n}

"Judging by the way that serf in the back row keeps glancing around, our Nemesite has swallowed the bait just like the void rat he is. The porridge will hit the fan any moment now." {n}A most benign smile crosses her face.{/n}

languages.text: "So wie dieser Leibeigene im Hintergrund sich umsieht, hat unser Nemesit den Köder geschluckt, Leerenratte, die er ist. Der Haferbrei wird jeden Moment am Dampfen sein." {n}Ein überaus freundliches Lächeln erhellt ihr Gesicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Judging by the way that serf in the back row keeps glancing around, our Nemesite has swallowed the bait just like the void rat he is. The porridge will hit the fan any moment now." {n}A most benign smile crosses her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So wie dieser Leibeigene im Hintergrund sich umsieht, hat unser Nemesit den Köder geschluckt, Leerenratte, die er ist. Der Haferbrei wird jeden Moment am Dampfen sein." {n}Ein überaus freundliches Lächeln erhellt ihr Gesicht.{/n}

languages.text: «A juzgar por el modo en que aquel siervo del fondo mira constantemente a su alrededor, creo que nuestro Nemesitio ha caído en la trampa como la sucia rata de vacío que es. Se va a empachar de gachas». {n}Una sonrisa de lo más benigno ilumina su rostro.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Judging by the way that serf in the back row keeps glancing around, our Nemesite has swallowed the bait just like the void rat he is. The porridge will hit the fan any moment now." {n}A most benign smile crosses her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «A juzgar por el modo en que aquel siervo del fondo mira constantemente a su alrededor, creo que nuestro Nemesitio ha caído en la trampa como la sucia rata de vacío que es. Se va a empachar de gachas». {n}Una sonrisa de lo más benigno ilumina su rostro.{/n}

languages.text: 「後列の農奴がチラチラ辺りを見回しているところを見ると、ネメサイトはヴォイドのネズミのように餌を飲み込んだようです。粥は今に大変なことになりますよ」{n}最高に穏やかな笑顔が彼女の顔に浮かぶ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Judging by the way that serf in the back row keeps glancing around, our Nemesite has swallowed the bait just like the void rat he is. The porridge will hit the fan any moment now." {n}A most benign smile crosses her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「後列の農奴がチラチラ辺りを見回しているところを見ると、ネメサイトはヴォイドのネズミのように餌を飲み込んだようです。粥は今に大変なことになりますよ」{n}最高に穏やかな笑顔が彼女の顔に浮かぶ。{/n}

languages.text: “从后排那个仆役不停东张西望的样子来看，我们的涅墨斯特已经像老鼠一样吞下了诱饵。战斗随时随地都可能会爆发。”{n}她的脸上掠过一丝亲切的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Judging by the way that serf in the back row keeps glancing around, our Nemesite has swallowed the bait just like the void rat he is. The porridge will hit the fan any moment now." {n}A most benign smile crosses her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “从后排那个仆役不停东张西望的样子来看，我们的涅墨斯特已经像老鼠一样吞下了诱饵。战斗随时随地都可能会爆发。”{n}她的脸上掠过一丝亲切的微笑。{/n}

languages.text: « À en juger par les coups d'œil que jette le cerf au dernier rang, Némésite a avalé l'appât comme le rat du vide qu'il est. Il sera bientôt dans le gruau jusqu'au coup, » {n}dit-elle avec un sourire innocent.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Judging by the way that serf in the back row keeps glancing around, our Nemesite has swallowed the bait just like the void rat he is. The porridge will hit the fan any moment now." {n}A most benign smile crosses her face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « À en juger par les coups d'œil que jette le cerf au dernier rang, Némésite a avalé l'appât comme le rat du vide qu'il est. Il sera bientôt dans le gruau jusqu'au coup, » {n}dit-elle avec un sourire innocent.{/n}

languages.text: "Arka sıradaki şu kölenin etrafına bakınıp durmasından yola çıkarsak bizim Nemezit, kendisi gibi bir uçsuz sıçanına yaraşırcasına yemi yuttu. İşler her an çığırından çıkabilir." {n}Yüzünden bugüne kadar gördüğün en şefkatli gülümseme geçiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Judging by the way that serf in the back row keeps glancing around, our Nemesite has swallowed the bait just like the void rat he is. The porridge will hit the fan any moment now." {n}A most benign smile crosses her face.{/n}
